442510.name: Dyadic OST
442510.description:
The official soundtrack for Dyadic, composed by Sam McLean. Each song has been mastered to Red Book standard, consisting of two-channel signed 16-bit Linear PCM, sampled at 44,100 Hz to maximise the listening experience.

Track List


1. Subterrane
2. Precipice
3. Streams Of Sapphire
4. Relic
5. Erhu The Dragon
6. Desolate
7. Cavernous
8. Dragon Rise
9. Hollow
10. Eclectic
11. Solitude
12. Desires
13. Underground City

Songs will be placed in your Dyadic folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Dyadic\Dyadic OST
442510.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
